title: Wave spells

properties.name: description
properties.value: Wave spells are the second strongest elemental group of magic combat spells in the standard spellbook. Elemental staves can be used to cover the costs of these spells. These are members only spells. Like all combat spells, each damage point caused by these spells yields 2 Magic experience and 1.33 Hitpoints experience.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Wave spells

Wave spells are the second strongest elemental group of magic combat spells in the standard spellbook. Elemental staves can be used to cover the costs of these spells. These are members only spells. Like all combat spells, each damage point caused by these spells yields 2 Magic experience and 1.33 Hitpoints experience.

Icon Mobile
icon 		Spell Level Runes Base XP Max damage
(without bonuses) 		Cost per cast
Wind Wave 62 5 1 36 17 337
Water Wave 65 5 7 1 37.5 18 372
Earth Wave 70 5 7 1 40 19 372
Fire Wave 75 5 7 1 42.5 20 372

rawContent:
{{external|rs}} '''Wave spells''' are the second strongest elemental group of [[magic]] [[combat spells]] in the [[standard spellbook]]. [[Elemental staves]] can be used to cover the costs of these spells. These are [[members]] only spells. Like all combat spells, each damage point caused by these spells yields 2 Magic experience and 1.33 [[Hitpoints]] experience. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !Icon ![[Mobile]]
icon !Spell !Level !Runes !Base XP !Max damage
(without bonuses) !Cost per cast |- |[[File:Wind Wave.png]] |[[File:Wind Wave icon (mobile).png]] |[[Wind Wave]] |{{SCP|Magic|62}} |{{RuneReq|Air=5|Blood=1}} |36 |17 |{{Coins|{{GEP|Blood rune}} + (5 * {{GEP|Air rune}})}} |- |[[File:Water Wave.png]] |[[File:Water Wave icon (mobile).png]] |[[Water Wave]] |{{SCP|Magic|65}} |{{RuneReq|Air=5|Water=7|Blood=1}} |37.5 |18 |{{Coins|{{GEP|Blood rune}} + (7 * {{GEP|Water rune}}) + (5 * {{GEP|Air rune}})}} |- |[[File:Earth Wave.png]] |[[File:Earth Wave icon (mobile).png]] |[[Earth Wave]] |{{SCP|Magic|70}} |{{RuneReq|Air=5|Earth=7|Blood=1}} |40 |19 |{{Coins|{{GEP|Blood rune}} + (7 * {{GEP|Earth rune}}) + (5 * {{GEP|Air rune}})}} |- |[[File:Fire Wave.png]] |[[File:Fire Wave icon (mobile).png]] |[[Fire Wave]] |{{SCP|Magic|75}} |{{RuneReq|Air=5|Fire=7|Blood=1}} |42.5 |20 |{{Coins|{{GEP|Blood rune}} + (7 * {{GEP|Fire rune}}) + (5 * {{GEP|Air rune}})}} |} ==Gallery== Wind Wave.gif|Wind Wave Water Wave.gif|Water Wave Earth Wave.gif|Earth Wave Fire Wave.gif|Fire Wave {{Combat spells}} {{Standard spellbook}}
